verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, When I bring the <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon a <S%H776>land<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from <S%H7097>among<s%> <S%H5414>them<s%>, and set him for their <S%H6822>watchman<s%>;
if <S%H7200><s%>, when he seeth the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%>, he <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, and <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>;

then <S%H8085>whosoever<s%> <S%H8085>heareth<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, and taketh not <S%H2094>warning<s%>, if the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, and take him <S%H3947>away<s%>, his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon his own <S%H7218>head<s%>.

He <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, and took not <S%H2094>warning<s%>; his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon <S%H2094>him<s%>; whereas if he had taken warning, he would have <S%H4422>delivered<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

But if the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, and <S%H8628>blow<s%> not the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> be not <S%H2094>warned<s%>, and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> from among <S%H3947>them<s%>; he is taken away in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1875>require<s%> at the <S%H6822>watchman<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

So <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, I have <S%H5414>set<s%> thee a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> at my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and give them warning from <S%H2094>me<s%>.

When I <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, O <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H4191>man<s%>, thou shalt surely <S%H4191>die<s%>, and thou dost not <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from his <S%H1870>way<s%>; that <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H2094><s%>, if thou warn the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of his <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H7725>it<s%>, and he turn not from his <S%H1870>way<s%>; he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, but thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

And <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: Thus ye <S%H559>speak<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> and our <S%H2403>sins<s%> are upon <S%H4743>us<s%>, and we pine away in <S%H2421>them<s%>; how then can we live?

Say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H2416>them<s%>, As I live, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, I have no <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; but that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H1870>way<s%> and <S%H2421>live<s%>: <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>ye<s%>, turn ye from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>; for why will ye <S%H4191>die<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

And <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall not <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H6588>transgression<s%>; and as for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, he shall not <S%H3782>fall<s%> thereby in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H7725>turneth<s%> from his <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>; neither shall he that is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H2421>live<s%> thereby in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H2398>sinneth<s%>.

When I <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, that he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>; if he <S%H982>trust<s%> to his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, none of his <S%H6666>righteous<s%> deeds shall be <S%H2142>remembered<s%>; but in his <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>committed<s%>, therein shall he <S%H4191>die<s%>.

Again <S%H559><s%>, when I say unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, Thou shalt <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>; if he <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H2403>sin<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right<s%>;

if the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H2258>pledge<s%>, give <S%H7999>again<s%> that which he had taken by <S%H1500>robbery<s%>, <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>, <S%H6213>committing<s%> no <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>; he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, he shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>.

None of his <S%H2403>sins<s%> that he hath <S%H2398>committed<s%> shall be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> against <S%H6213>him<s%>: he hath done that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right<s%>; he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>.

Yet the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal<s%>: but as for <S%H1870>them<s%>, their way is not <S%H8505>equal<s%>.
When the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7725>turneth<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H6213>committeth<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, he shall even die <S%H4191>therein<s%>.

And when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>turneth<s%> from his <S%H7564>wickedness<s%>, and <S%H6213>doeth<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right<s%>, he shall live <S%H2421>thereby<s%>.

Yet ye <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal<s%>. O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you every <S%H376>one<s%> after his <S%H1870>ways<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>captivity<s%>, in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2568>month<s%>, in the fifth day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that one that had <S%H6412>escaped<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, The <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H5221>smitten<s%>.

Now the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had been upon me in the <S%H6153>evening<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> he that was <S%H6412>escaped<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>; and he had <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, until he <S%H935>came<s%> to me in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> was <S%H6605>opened<s%>, and I was no more <S%H481>dumb<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, they that <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> those <S%H2723>waste<s%> places in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%>, and he <S%H3423>inherited<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>: but we are <S%H7227>many<s%>; the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> us for <S%H4181>inheritance<s%>.

Wherefore <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: Ye <S%H398>eat<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> unto your <S%H1544>idols<s%>, and <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>: and shall ye <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>?

Ye <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon your <S%H2719>sword<s%>, ye <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%>, and ye <S%H2930>defile<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>: and shall ye <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>?

Thus shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, surely they that are in the <S%H2723>waste<s%> places shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and him that is in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to be <S%H398>devoured<s%>; and they that are in the <S%H4679>strongholds<s%> and in the <S%H4631>caves<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and an <S%H8077>astonishment<s%>; and the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of her <S%H5797>power<s%> shall <S%H7673>cease<s%>; and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, so that none shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%>.

Then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when I have <S%H5414>made<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and an <S%H8077>astonishment<s%>, because of all their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which they have <S%H6213>committed<s%>.

And as for <S%H1121>thee<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> <S%H681>of<s%> thee by the <S%H7023>walls<s%> and in the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2297>one<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H251>brother<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H935>Come<s%>, I pray <S%H8085>you<s%>, and hear what is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And they <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee as the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3996>cometh<s%>, and they <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee as my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they <S%H8085>hear<s%> thy <S%H1697>words<s%>, but <S%H6213>do<s%> them <S%H6310>not<s%>; for with their mouth they <S%H6213>show<s%> much <S%H5690>love<s%>, but their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1215>gain<s%>.

And <S%H5690><s%>, lo, thou art unto them as a very lovely <S%H7892>song<s%> of one that hath a <S%H3303>pleasant<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and can play <S%H2895>well<s%> on an <S%H5059>instrument<s%>; for they <S%H8085>hear<s%> thy <S%H1697>words<s%>, but they do them <S%H6213>not<s%>.
And when this cometh to <S%H935>pass<s%>, <S%H935>(behold<s%>, it cometh,) then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> that a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> hath been among <S%H8432>them<s%>.
